thread.title: Salman Khan performs Garba with ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’ co-star Sonam Kapoor in Ahmedabad
thread.title_full: Salman Khan performs Garba with ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’ co-star Sonam Kapoor in Ahmedabad - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Salman Khan performs Garba with ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’ co-star Sonam Kapoor in Ahmedabad
text: Salman Khan kickstarted the promotions of his Diwali release ‘Prem Ratan Dhan Payo’, with a raas Garba event in Ahmedabad recently. The ‘ Bajrang i Bhaijaan’ actor was accompanied by his co-star Sonam Kapoor and appeared to be in high spirits as he started dancing, bringing back memories of his effortlessly executed moves in ‘Dholi Taro’, which […] »
